Articles.Content:
Is it KerbinSide that is defining sites as anomalies?

SCANSat marks anything using the PQSCity class (What Kerbal Konstructs/KerbTown uses to place objects) as anomalous.
Ah, okay. Quite the broad brush it paints.

I mentioned off road dirt tracks in the 0.25 thread. Alshain said I should mention it here.

...

We totally need off road dirt tracks.

I dont know if its the issue with kerbin side or kerbal Konstrukt.. but there is one very irritating thing.

Launch site selection menu is transparent to clicks, i drag my rocket that is hidden behind it all the time.

Part catalog also had same issue, but it was fixed in latest version.

I dont know if its the issue with kerbin side or kerbal Konstrukt.. but there is one very irritating thing.

Launch site selection menu is transparent to clicks, i drag my rocket that is hidden behind it all the time.

Part catalog also had same issue, but it was fixed in latest version.

medsouz is addressing click-throughs in Kerbal Konstructs.

medsouz is addressing click-throughs in Kerbal Konstructs.

Already fixed, just polishing the update before I release it.

Coastal Extras 2 is out. Includes a boat launch on KSC Island that is a launch location. Please note you spawn at the top of the ramp on the platform, not in the water. And no, it's not a good idea to launch planes or rockets off it.

Find the new pack in the OP.
Now that we start at 50% thrust it should be fine to launch rockets there. *whistle*

Coastal Extras 2 is out. Includes a boat launch on KSC Island that is a launch location. Please note you spawn at the top of the ramp on the platform, not in the water. And no, it's not a good idea to launch planes or rockets off it.

Find the new pack in the OP.

Whoohoo! I hope that includes a great big pier. The pana-max crane had to be sized up to fit the Kerbin Side containers, so I hope it fits. : p

Whoohoo! I hope that includes a great big pier. The pana-max crane had to be sized up to fit the Kerbin Side containers, so I hope it fits. : p

Not this pack. I'm planning something for a larger docks with a runway though.

Not this pack. I'm planning something for a larger docks with a runway though.

Ohhhh!

(The forum wants me to put more characters on this page for me to send.)
Can`t wait to see full RemoteTech integration...) And maybe a little icons on the launch site logos that will show if this site have antennas or not.
I wish Squad would add your stuff to the game. This is what needs to be added to make the game more believable or at the very least, make Kerbin more interesting to explore.

I wish Squad would add your stuff to the game. This is what needs to be added to make the game more believable or at the very least, make Kerbin more interesting to explore.

Well, for now, that's the purpose of this fantastic mod.
So....... What's being worked on now? Or is it a secret?
Lots. Nothing I want to talk about until KK 0.4 and KSP 0.25 land.
Now that is an evil tease

Yeah, that was a bit. I'm putting my feet up for a few days and catching up with some games in my backlog and my social life. Still plenty in the works though.

Launch Pads 2; KSC #3; Re-work of Command Centres; Tracking Stations update; Airfield Extras 4; Area 110011 Expansion; Jeb's Junkyard; Coastal Extras 3... to name a few.
I was just adding an extra near Sandy Island when I realized it evolved since I was last there. Now it really looks like a helliport.
Can you tell me the exact coordinates of area 11011 and v.l.a?

Coastal Extras 2 is out. Includes a boat launch on KSC Island that is a launch location. Please note you spawn at the top of the ramp on the platform, not in the water. And no, it's not a good idea to launch planes or rockets off it.

Find the new pack in the OP.

Just saw this post. Thx for the new boatlaunch! Going to check it out today

Just saw this post. Thx for the new boatlaunch! Going to check it out today

You're welcome. There's two assets for boat launching in the new pack. Let me know if they're any good. I'm planning a 'drydock' for bigger boat launches off the land in a future update.
I'll do that as a last resort only if the new KK versions screw things up too.

I'll do that as a last resort only if the new KK versions screw things up too.

Confused. Possibly wrong but related thread chap? What's up?

EDIT - Tracked back. Clicked. Apologies.

A few questions about the Oceania pack:

1.) Do you have any larger pictures of the carrier? The only one that I can find is the small picture in the OP.

2.) Will the carrier have any sort of arrestor wires?

Any response would be greatly appreciated, thanks in advance. I'm really looking forward to this one!
